alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 4:09AM EST until November 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Capital District, Schoharie Valley, Mohawk Valley, Lake George Saratoga region, southern Adirondacks, southern Vermont, and the northern Berkshires. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as snow, then transition to a wintry mix including freezing rain by Wednesday morning. Precipitation tapers off Wednesday afternoon into early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
